Quite different from other love stories. It shows that emotional and love genre movies can end with death of both lovers in the end. I really appreciate the director,producer and script writers that they took risk of killing them both in the end, as many directors would oppose that. Acting of both the stars is amazing and will definitely pave path if some other movies are made in this genre. The songs are apt to the scenes and very good. After seeing the movie, i do not feel bad and sad that both of them are not alive. This is where i give full marks to movie that they spread the message clearly. Please watch this film once, and you will fall in love with it.
